about_the_game:
Infected Frontier is a polygon zombie survival looter shooter with base building and crafting.
Story and Missions - Immerse yourself in an exciting story and complete missions to earn unique rewards and advance the plot.
Your only goal is survival, everything else is optional.



Play Your Way - Play single player, online server based multiplayer, or online co-op with friends.
Character Creation - Create a character just for you.
Base Building.
Crafting - Create hundreds of items for all types of situations.
Scavenging - Search the world or kill enemies to find items.
Gathering - Raw materials like wood, stone, metal, and more.
Gun Customization - Find and craft many different attachments to build a gun that suits your playstyle.
Survival Mechanics - Keep your hunger and thirst under control to stay alive.
Fishing - Simple fishing system to find food.
Collect - There are hundreds of unique items to collect.
Date, Time, and Climate Systems.
Inventory management.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K / Ryzen 3 1300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Infected Frontier is a polygonal zombie survival game with looting and shooting, base building, and crafting. Your goal is survival. With an immersive story and missions, you will immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where every decision counts.
